discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACD
5) Create an admin user.

- Go to System -> Admin -> Admin -> Administrators.

- Create a new admin with type Remote.

- Select the User Group.

- Select type wildcard.

- Select the no_access profile .

choices.A: Create a wildcard administrator on the FortiGate.
choices.E: Set the RADIUS authentication type to MS-CHAPv2.
choices.C: Create multiple administrator profiles with matching RADIUS VSAs.

questions.question_text:
A customer wants to use a central RADIUS server for management authentication when connecting to the FortiGate GUI and to provide different levels of access for different types of employees.
Which three actions are required to provide the requested functionality? (Choose three.)

Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

The exhibit shows the steps for creating a URL rewrite policy on a FortiWeb.
Which statement represents the purpose of this policy?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct as per https://docs.fortinet.com/document/fortiweb/6.3.0/administration-guide/961303/rewriting-redirecting

choices.D: The policy redirects only HTTPS URLs containing the ^/(.*)$ string to HTTP.
choices.C: The policy redirects only HTTP URLs containing the ^/(.*)$ string to HTTPS.
choices.B: The policy redirects all HTTP URLs to HTTPS.
choices.A: The policy redirects all HTTPS URLs to HTTP.
FortiDDoS between FG1 and FG2 and the Internet
choices.E: FortiDDoS between FG1 and FG2 and VDOMs

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

You need to apply the security features listed below to the network shown in the exhibit.
"¢ High grade DDoS protection
"¢ Web security and load balancing for Server 1 and Server 2
"¢ Solution must be PCI DSS compliant
"¢ Enhanced security to DNS 1 and DNS 2
What are three solutions for this scenario? (Choose three.)

choices.A: The new session added in the DP session table is automatically deleted, if the traffic is denied by the processing worker.
choices.B: No new session is added in the DP session table until the processing worker accepts the traffic.
choices.C: A new session added in the DP session table remains in the table even if the traffic is denied by the processing worker.
choices.D: A new session added in the DP session table remains in the table only if traffic is accepted by the processing worker.

choices.A: Reduce the number of packets being logged.
